actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: To amend the Interstate Commerce Act to provide authorizations for appropriations for the Interstate Commerce Commission for fiscal years 1974, 1975, and 197.

summary.text: Authorizes to be appropriated, under the Interstate Commerce Act, to carry out the functions, powers, and duties of the Interstate Commerce Commission $36,300,000 for fiscal year 1974, $39,930,000 for fiscal year 1975, and $43,920,000 for fiscal year 1976.

titles.title: To amend the Interstate Commerce Act to provide authorizations for appropriations for the Interstate Commerce Commission for fiscal years 1974, 1975, and 197.
